name: ethercalc Juju charm
description:
EtherCalc is a web spreadsheet

Your data is saved on the web, and people can edit the same document at the same time. Everybody's changes are instantly reflected on all screens. Work together on inventories, survey forms, list management, brainstorming sessions and more!
license:
# Overview

EtherCalc is a web spreadsheet.

Your data is saved on the web, and people can edit the same document at the same time. Everybody's changes are instantly reflected on all screens.

Work together on inventories, survey forms, list management, brainstorming sessions and more! 

Source: https://ethercalc.net

# Usage

Deploy EtherCalc:

    juju deploy ethercalc

Expose the EtherCalc service:

     juju expose ethercalc

You can then browse to http://serviceip:8000 to use the service.


# Contact Information

* Maintainer: Joe Liau <joe@ubuntuvancouver.org>
* Source: https://ethercalc.net
readme:
# Overview

EtherCalc is a web spreadsheet.

Your data is saved on the web, and people can edit the same document at the same time. Everybody's changes are instantly reflected on all screens.

Work together on inventories, survey forms, list management, brainstorming sessions and more! 

Source: https://ethercalc.net

# Usage

Deploy EtherCalc:

    juju deploy ethercalc

Expose the EtherCalc service:

     juju expose ethercalc

You can then browse to http://serviceip:8000 to use the service.


# Contact Information

* Maintainer: Joe Liau <joe@ubuntuvancouver.org>
* Source: https://ethercalc.net
